vampire.config_products.BaseProduct module¶

Data Products module.

Provides classes for each data product supported within Vampire. New products should be added here.

class vampire.config_products.BaseProduct.BaseProduct[source]¶

Bases: object

Base class for data product configuration objects.

Manages registration of data product configurations and creation of data product configuration objects. Data product configurations provide the ability to generate config file sections related to the specific data product (e.g. product generation, publishing of data product to database or GIS server).

classmethod create(product_type, country, product_date, interval, vampire_defaults=None)[source]¶

Create data product of the specified type.

Creates the data product identified by product_type and sets required values.

Parameters:
  • product_type (string) – Product name.
  • country (string) – Country data product will be created for. This is used for downloading data and identifying appropriate resources and default values during processing.
  • product_date (datetime) – Date for product being generated.
  • interval (string) – Interval for product generation - daily, weekly, monthly, seasonal.
  • vampire_defaults (VampireDefaults) –
Returns:

Data product object of type specified (a registered subclass of BaseProduct).
classmethod register_subclass(product_type)[source]¶

Register product with the product manager.

Registers the data product identified by product_type with the data product manager. This allows the appropriate product to be created automatically when requested.

Parameters:product_type (string) – Product name.
subclasses = {'chirps_longterm_average': <class 'vampire.config_products.BaseProduct.CHIRPSLongtermAverageProduct'>, 'days_since_last_rain': <class 'vampire.config_products.BaseProduct.DaysSinceLastRainProduct'>, 'evi_longterm_average': <class 'vampire.config_products.BaseProduct.MODISEVILongtermAverageProduct'>, 'flood_forecast': <class 'vampire.config_products.BaseProduct.FloodForecastProduct'>, 'lst_longterm_average': <class 'vampire.config_products.BaseProduct.MODISLSTLongtermAverageProduct'>, 'rainfall_anomaly': <class 'vampire.config_products.BaseProduct.RainfallAnomalyProduct'>, 'spi': <class 'vampire.config_products.BaseProduct.SPIProduct'>, 'tci': <class 'vampire.config_products.BaseProduct.TCIProduct'>, 'vci': <class 'vampire.config_products.BaseProduct.VCIProduct'>, 'vhi': <class 'vampire.config_products.BaseProduct.VHIProduct'>}¶
class vampire.config_products.BaseProduct.CHIRPSLongtermAverageProduct(country, product_date, interval, vampire_defaults)[source]¶

Bases: vampire.config_products.BaseProduct.BaseProduct

CHIRPS long-term statistics data product configuration.

Manages generation of configuration file sections for CHIRPS long-term statistics data products.

generate_config(input_dir=None, output_dir=None, input_pattern=None, output_pattern=None, functions=None, download=True)[source]¶

Generate config file section for generating CHIRPS long-term statistics.

Generate config file entries required to create long-term statistics from CHIRPS rainfall data for the specified country, date and interval.

Parameters:
  • input_dir (string) – Directory where the CHIRPS precipitation files are located.
  • output_dir (string) – Directory to save the CHIRPS long-term statistics output file(s).
  • input_pattern (string) – Regular expression pattern to used to find the files to be included in the long-term statistics calculations.
  • output_pattern (string) – Pattern to be used to generate the long-term statistics output file name(s). May refer to elements within the input_pattern.
  • functions (string) – List of functions to be calculated. Options are ‘AVG’, ‘MIN’, ‘MAX’, ‘STD’.
  • download (bool) – Flag specifying whether the data needs to be downloaded first. If true, appropriate download configuration sections will be generated.
Returns:

Config file sections required for generating CHIRPS long-term statistics.
Return type:

string
generate_header()[source]¶

Generate details related to CHIRPS long-term statistics that go in the config file header.

product_dir¶

Get directory name for product output.

product_file¶

Get full path to the output product file name.

product_pattern¶

Get output product file name pattern (regular expression used to search for the product file).

valid_from_date¶

Get date the output product file is valid from.

valid_to_date¶

Get date the output product file is valid until.

class vampire.config_products.BaseProduct.DaysSinceLastRainProduct(country, product_date, interval, vampire_defaults)[source]¶

Bases: vampire.config_products.BaseProduct.BaseProduct

Days Since Last Rain data product configuration.

Manages generation of configuration file sections for Days Since Last Rain data products including product generation and publishing.

generate_config(data_dir=None, output_dir=None, file_pattern=None, threshold=None, max_days=None, download=True, crop=True, crop_dir=None)[source]¶

Generate a config file process for the Days Since Last Rain product.

Generate VAMPIRE config file processes for the product including download and crop if specified.

Parameters:
  • data_dir (string) – Directory path for precipitation files. Default is None.
  • output_dir (string) – Path for product output. If the output_dir is None, the VAMPIRE default Days Since Last Rain product directory will be used.
  • file_pattern (string) – Regular expression pattern for finding current precipitation file. Default is None.
  • threshold (float) – Rainfall threshold value.
  • max_days (int) – Number of days to evaluate for days since last rain.
  • download (bool) – Flag indicating whether data should be downloaded.
  • crop (bool) – Flag indicating whether data should be cropped to a boundary.
  • crop_dir (string) – Directory for output of cropped files.
Returns:

Returns string containing the configuration file process.
Return type:

string
generate_header()[source]¶

Generate details related to Days Since Last Rain that go in the config file header.

generate_publish_config()[source]¶

Generate config section to publish Days Since Last Rain data product.

Generates configuration file section to publish the Days Since Last Rain output file to a GIS server.

Returns:Config file sections required for publishing Days Since Last Rain.
Return type:string

Get directory name for product output.

product_file¶

Get full path to the output product file name.

Get output product file name pattern (regular expression used to search for the product file).

valid_to_date¶

class vampire.config_products.BaseProduct.MODISEVILongtermAverageProduct(country, product_date, interval, vampire_defaults)[source]¶

Bases: vampire.config_products.BaseProduct.BaseProduct

MODIS Enhanced Vegetation Index Long-term Average data product configuration.

Manages generation of configuration file sections for MODIS Enhanced Vegetation Index Long-term Average data products including product generation.

generate_config(input_dir=None, output_dir=None, input_pattern=None, output_pattern=None, functions=None, download=True)[source]¶

Generate config file section for generating long-term statistics for MODIS EVI data.

Generate config file entries required to create long-term statistics for MODIS Enhanced Vegetation Index (EVI) for the specified country and interval. Statistics include average, minimum, maximum, standard deviation.

Parameters:
  • input_dir (string) – Directory where the MODIS EVI files are located.
  • output_dir (string) – Directory to save the SPI output file.
  • input_pattern (string) – Regular expression pattern to used to find the files to be included in the long-term statistics calculations.
  • output_pattern (string) – Pattern to be used to generate the EVI statistics output file name. May refer to elements within the input_pattern.
  • functions (string) – List of functions to be calculated. Options are ‘AVG’, ‘MIN’, ‘MAX’, ‘STD’.
  • download (bool) – Flag specifying whether the data needs to be downloaded first. If true, appropriate download configuration sections will be generated.
Returns:

Config file sections required for generating MODIS EVI long-term statistics.
Return type:

string
generate_header()[source]¶

Generate details related to MODIS EVI long-term average that go in the config file header.

product_dir¶

Get directory name for product output.

product_file¶

Get full path to the output product file name.

product_pattern¶

Get output product file name pattern (regular expression used to search for the product file).

valid_from_date¶

Get date the output product file is valid from.

valid_to_date¶

Get date the output product file is valid until.

Generate config file section for generating Rainfall Anomaly.

Generate config file entries required to create Rainfall Anomaly for the specified country, date and interval.

Parameters:
  • output_dir (string) – Directory to save the Rainfall Anomaly output file.
  • cur_file (string) – Precipitation file for the product date.
  • cur_dir (string) – Directory where the precipitation file for the product date is located.
  • cur_pattern (string) – Regular expression pattern to used to find the precipitation file for the product date.
  • lta_file (string) – Long-term average precipitation file for the product date.
  • lta_dir (string) – Directory where the long-term average precipitation file is located.
  • lta_pattern (string) – Regular expression pattern to used to find the long-term average precipitation file for the product date.
  • output_filename (string) – Filename for Rainfall Anomaly output file.
  • output_pattern (string) – Pattern to be used to generate the Rainfall Anomaly output file name. May refer to elements within the cur_pattern.

Config file sections required for generating Rainfall Anomaly.

class vampire.config_products.BaseProduct.SPIProduct(country, product_date, interval, vampire_defaults)[source]¶

Bases: vampire.config_products.BaseProduct.BaseProduct

Standardized Precipitation Index data product configuration.

Manages generation of configuration file sections for Standardized Precipitation Index data products including product generation and publishing.

generate_config(output_dir=None, cur_file=None, cur_dir=None, cur_pattern=None, lta_file=None, lta_dir=None, lta_pattern=None, ltsd_file=None, ltsd_dir=None, ltsd_pattern=None, output_file=None, output_pattern=None)[source]¶

Generate config file section for generating Standardized Precipitation Index (SPI).

Generate config file entries required to create SPI for the specified country, date and interval.

Parameters:
  • output_dir (string) – Directory to save the SPI output file.
  • cur_file (string) – Precipitation file for the product date.
  • cur_dir (string) – Directory where the precipitation file for the product date is located.
  • cur_pattern (string) – Regular expression pattern to used to find the precipitation file for the product date.
  • lta_file (string) – Long-term average precipitation file for the product date.
  • lta_dir (string) – Directory where the long-term average precipitation file is located.
  • lta_pattern (string) – Regular expression pattern to used to find the long-term average precipitation file for the product date.
  • ltsd_file (string) – Long-term standard deviation precipitation file for the product date.
  • ltsd_dir (string) – Directory where the long-term standard deviation precipitation file is located.
  • ltsd_pattern (string) – Regular expression pattern to used to find the long-term standard deviation precipitation file for the product date.
  • output_file (string) – Filename for SPI output file.
  • output_pattern (string) – Pattern to be used to generate the SPI output file name. May refer to elements within the cur_pattern.
Returns:

Config file sections required for generating SPI.
Return type:

string

class vampire.config_products.BaseProduct.TCIProduct(country, product_date, interval, vampire_defaults)[source]¶

Bases: vampire.config_products.BaseProduct.BaseProduct

Temperature Condition Index data product configuration.

Manages generation of configuration file sections for Temperature Condition Index data products including product generation.

generate_config(lst_cur_file=None, lst_cur_dir=None, lst_cur_pattern=None, lst_max_file=None, lst_max_dir=None, lst_max_pattern=None, lst_min_file=None, lst_min_dir=None, lst_min_pattern=None, output_filename=None, output_dir=None, output_pattern=None)[source]¶

Generate config file section for generating VCI.

Generate config file entries required to create VCI for the specified country, date and interval.

Parameters:
  • lst_cur_file (string) – Land Surface Temperature (LST) file for the product date.
  • lst_cur_dir (string) – Directory where the LST file for the product date is located.
  • lst_cur_pattern (string) – Regular expression pattern to used to find the LST file for the product date.
  • lst_max_file (string) – LST long-term maximum file.
  • lst_max_dir (string) – Directory where the long-term maximum LST file is located.
  • lst_max_pattern (string) – Regular expression pattern to used to find the LST long-term maximum file.
  • lst_min_file (string) – LST long-term minimum file.
  • lst_min_dir (string) – Directory where the long-term maximum LST file is located.
  • lst_min_pattern (string) – Regular expression pattern to used to find the LST long-term minimum file.
  • output_filename (string) – Filename for TCI output file.
  • output_dir (string) – Directory to save the TCI output file.
  • output_pattern (string) – Pattern to be used to generate the TCI output file name. May refer to elements within the lst_cur_pattern.
Returns:

Config file sections required for generating TCI.
Return type:

string

Generate config file section for generating VCI.

Generate config file entries required to create VCI for the specified country, date and interval.

Parameters:
  • evi_cur_file (string) – Enhanced Vegetation Index (EVI) file for the product date.
  • evi_cur_dir (string) – Directory where the EVI file for the product date is located.
  • evi_cur_pattern (string) – Regular expression pattern to used to find the EVI file for the product date.
  • evi_max_file (string) – EVI long-term maximum file.
  • evi_max_dir (string) – Directory where the long-term maximum EVI file is located.
  • evi_max_pattern (string) – Regular expression pattern to used to find the EVI long-term maximum file.
  • evi_min_file (string) – EVI long-term minimum file.
  • evi_min_dir (string) – Directory where the long-term maximum EVI file is located.
  • evi_min_pattern (string) – Regular expression pattern to used to find the EVI long-term minimum file.
  • output_filename (string) – Filename for VCI output file.
  • output_dir (string) – Directory to save the VCI output file.
  • output_pattern (string) – Pattern to be used to generate the VCI output file name. May refer to elements within the evi_cur_pattern.
Returns:

Config file sections required for generating VCI.

class vampire.config_products.BaseProduct.VHIProduct(country, product_date, interval, vampire_defaults)[source]¶

Bases: vampire.config_products.BaseProduct.BaseProduct

Vegetation Health Index data product configuration.

Manages generation of configuration file sections for Vegetation Health Index data products including product generation, masking the product using a boundary, and publishing.

generate_config(tci_file=None, tci_dir=None, tci_pattern=None, vci_file=None, vci_dir=None, vci_pattern=None, output_file=None, output_dir=None, output_pattern=None, reproject='TCI')[source]¶

Generate config file section for generating VCI.

Generate config file entries required to create VCI for the specified country, date and interval.

Parameters:
  • tci_file (string) – Temperature Condition Index (TCI) file for the product date.
  • tci_dir (string) – Directory where the TCI file for the product date is located.
  • tci_pattern (string) – Regular expression pattern to used to find the TCI file for the product date.
  • vci_file (string) – Vegetation Condition Index (VCI) file for the product date.
  • vci_dir (string) – Directory where the VCI file is located.
  • vci_pattern (string) – Regular expression pattern to used to find the VCI file for the product date.
  • output_filename (string) – Filename for VCI output file.
  • output_dir (string) – Directory to save the VCI output file.
  • output_pattern (string) – Pattern to be used to generate the VCI output file name. May refer to elements within the evi_cur_pattern.
  • reproject (string) – Data source to use for output resolution. The output product file will be reprojected to match the specified source. Valid options are ‘TCI’ and ‘VCI’. The default value is ‘TCI’.
Returns:

Config file sections required for generating VHI.
Return type:

string
generate_header()[source]¶

Generate details related to VHI that go in the config file header.

generate_mask_config(boundary_file=None, boundary_dir=None, boundary_pattern=None, boundary_field=None, output_file=None, output_dir=None, output_pattern=None)[source]¶

Generate config section to mask VHI data product by a boundary.

Generates configuration file section to mask the VHI output file using a shapefile boundary.

Parameters:
  • boundary_file (string) – Name of boundary file (shapefile) to use as mask.
  • boundary_dir (string) – Directory where the TCI file for the product date is located.
  • boundary_pattern (string) – Regular expression pattern to used to find the boundary file.
  • boundary_field (string) –
  • output_filename (string) – Filename for masked VHI output file.
  • output_dir (string) – Directory to save the masked VHI output file.
  • output_pattern (string) – Pattern to be used to generate the masked VHI output file name.
Returns:

Config file sections required for generating VHI boundary mask.
Return type:

string
